titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NON-OPERATIVE DIAGNOSIS RATE (PERCENTAGE OVERALL) - Description

body.p:
NON-OPERATIVE DIAGNOSIS RATE (PERCENTAGE OVERALL) is the percentage of breast cancers diagnosed with a PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'Needle
Biopsy
for Cytology (Fine Needle Aspiration or Cytology)' or 'Needle
Biopsy
for Histology (Wide Bore Needle or Core Biopsy)' .
